quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Thinking about my grandmother a lot.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: At least she lived a very long and I'm sure, a very happy life. Got you this card. When you're ready. We all signed it. We just wanted you to know we're thinking about you.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Thank you. "Congratulations, Darryl. Let's get wasted." "Have fun today, big guy." "Aww, yeah. Party time. Whoo-whoop."

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: It's possible that some people thought it was your birthday.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: "Hooray. Live it up big D. " "Days like this don't come often enough. Time to celebrate. You deserve this"?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Birthday punches! [softly punching Darryl in the stomach] One two three four five sice seven eight!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: ...thirteen fourteen fifteen sixteen seventeen eighteen nineteen twenty twenty-one twenty-two twenty-three twenty-four twenty-five twenty-six!...

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: ...So I got an early res at Blue Wasabi and I'm taking Rachel. She's picking me up after work.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Nice. Do the damn thing. - Pow! [they fist bump and explode]

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Blue Wasabi is so good, but get the cheeseburger. They say they won't do it, but they will if you make a scene.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Okay, bye. Okay, bye. [kisses Michael] I'll miss you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Miss you. Okay. I'll be in my office if you need me.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay, bye. Bye. All right, bye. Bye... bye.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Don't go. I don't want you to go. Oh don't go. Don't go.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Holly and I are dating. It's been a week, and I still can't believe it. [sighs] It goes to show that everything you want in life, you get. And you can't work for it. It just comes to you.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: And what do we have here?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: From my secret admirer. That's you!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: I dominate Valentine's Day. I practically make romance into a science.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: "Roses are red. Violets are blue. Look in the vase to find your first clue." Oh, my gosh. It's a romantic scavenger hunt!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Oh, close. It's a romantic treasure hunt. A scavenger hunt is where you find items from a master list. This is where you follow clues that lead to a prize. Common misuse. Good luck.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [rubbing hands with Holly] Are these numbers correct?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Are you... are you sick, Oscar? Do you need to go home? 'Cause you're grossing me out.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: I jus... I just need a signature.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [getting out of a taxi] There you go. Thanks.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: How much did you give him?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Wait. I don't have my scarf.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: I'm missing my scarf. Oh. [both laugh]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: We decided to have a Valentine's day lunch and then that way we can spend the entire night with Cece and avoid the Valentine's day dinner thing. It's a whole thing.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Um, there was an amazing buffet and there was a chocolate fondue... station. And what else was there?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Yes. Never found that bottom, did we?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Are you good at jigsaw puzzles?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Are you kidding me? It's all I did every summer when my brothers were out sailing.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: But if there is a romantic thing with Gabe, I should probably...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Oh! No, no, no, no. It's not weird at all. You have your new girlfriend. I have Gabe. This is just as friends.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: At least until Stanley calms down.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: D...d...d...d...don't look. I accidentally did his Sudoku. [Stanley glares at Andy]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [on phone] All right, I will fax over it to you. Whoop. I will fax it over to you. Okay. Thank you. [chuckles]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Okay, my name is j...j...j...j...j...j...j...j Jim Halpert and I will fax it in to you... under you. I'll fax it under you. Oh, excuse me. I just p...p...p...p pissed my pants. Not really. I didn't really. [clears throat]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [goes to hand Dwight a valentines card] Wait.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: You're just filling that out right now. That wasn't meant for me. I will not be your Valentine.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.line: I don't know if anyone else feels this way and don't get me wrong, I love Michael and Holly, and maybe I'm being overly sensitive, but... the PDA.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Thank you! I mean, I'm thrilled for them.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.line: No one is more thrilled for them than I am...

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Obviously, so happy for them both.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: I don't know, guys. I, for one, enjoy watching them, because...

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Can I finish? Can I finish? Is that okay? I was saying...I enjoy watching them because it makes me horny.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: So tell me about your new girlfriend.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: She's neat. Uh, I met her at Darryl's cousin's party. We were the only two white people there.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: That's Gabe's boom box. Come on. We have to go find it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: I wish you well on your quest.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: [to Toby] I hear them kissing all the time. It's this horrible plipping sound. You know, it's like Chinese water torture. Just...[makes popping sound] like it's coming from my own head.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Sit. Okay, just close your eyes. [massaging Holly's back]

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I cannot keep myself from Michael. Everything he does is sexy. He has this undeniable animal magnetism. He's a jungle cat. The man exudes sex. He can put both his legs behind his head.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Thank you all for meeting on such sort notice.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [sitting in Holly's lap] Yes. Michael Scott, Dunder Mifflin. What is the purpose of this meeting?

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Seeing as it's Valentine's Day, I felt it would be apropos to have a little refresher course on romance in the workplace.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Perfect. Yes. It is quite apro-propriate. Carry on.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: First things first. An office romance is permissible. Not something you'd expect to hear from corporate. Well, guess what. Sabre is 100% tolerant of office romances.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Speaking of, Gabe, I don't see Erin at this meeting.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: Uh, I also don't see Andy.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: I get it. Andy's slamming my girlfriend. Very funny. What I do not approve of, however, is public displays of affection, or PDAs. PDAs are totally superfluous to a happy, healthy office romance. Perfect example. Look at Jim and Pam.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: They don't touch. They don't kiss. You would hardly even know that they were husband and wife.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Okay. So, PDAs. That's gonna include behaviors such as hugging, kissing, uh...

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Butt honking. Yeah, all the honking.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.line: The one where you start in a crouches position, then you leap...

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Sure. Basically, there's no precise definition, but you know it when you see it. Ahem.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Are you guys listening to this?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: What, are you talking about me and Holly?

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Maybe you find your own chair.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Yeah, and it's not just the kissing. It's the flirtatious whispering.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Whispering and tickling have their place in business.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: That thing were you softly exhale on her neck.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I... Okay, yeah, that's pretty hot. I will give you that. Look, you are all hypocrites. You all do it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Michael. Confession: I have done PDA in the office.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I've had intercourse in the office.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: As has Ryan. As has Kelly. As has Meredith. As has Phyllis. As has Darryl. As has Creed. [Creed smiles and nods] As has Michael and as has Holly.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You win. But here's what we are going to do. We are going to designate one of our closets as a hook-up zone.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Just leave it how you said...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Michael, that's absurd. What if two couples want to go at the same time?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Okay, then we have two closets. No, no, we're gonna have three closets, one for each base, no homers. Yes?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: And what is the hook-up zone policy on masturbation?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, no, it's great. I love working at Dunder Mifflin, a division of Taliban enterprises.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: That's weird. I mean, that's weird to have sex in the office. That's where you work, right?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: You know, you're in a meeting, and nobody knows that you've had sex there, except for you and him.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Don't mind us. You keep working.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Oh, my God. It's a song.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: What do you think is on it?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: [softy] We should actually probably talk about it outside or we might make Darryl mad.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: [softly] Not if we're talking like this. I think it's okay. He doesn't seem to hear us.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: I think he can hear us.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: [softly] That makes sense, 'cause I feel like I'd be able to hear us at this level.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: No, I'm just testing if he can hear.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Okay. Then no more talking. Let's just play the song.

quotes.speaker: Boom Box
quotes.line: [Gabe singing] The temp at night. The temp at night. The temp at night. The temp at night.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: You got it. Pick it up. Take it out.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Take it out. Pick it up. Pick it up. Pick it up. Take it out.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Sorry to interrupt. Forgot to collect my things.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ah, the old "leave behind." Oldest trick in the book. Good thing it's working.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Oh, no. Michael, I don't want to make people uncomfortable.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Since when is comfort the most important thing? I mean, I don't... I don't sit on your lap because it's comfortable. I sit on your lap because I like the way your thighs feel on my butt.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Yeah, but if they're uncomfortable, it makes me uncomfortable.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh. Okay. Well, if it makes you uncomfortable, then we'll stop.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Holly and I are like Romeo and Juliet. And this office is like the dragon that kept them apart.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hey, you know why people here are complaining? They are jealous of two people in love on Valentine's Day.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Wait, wait, wait, what do you mean you love me? We've only been dating for a week. Do you mean you love me like, "oh, hey, there's Holly. I love that girl." Or you do you mean you love me like you love me-love me?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Wow, you love me-love me. I love you-love you. [both laugh]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I am really disappointed in the office's policy on PDA at this moment. I love you. [shakes Holly's hand]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah, whatever. No big deal. Just the hottest girl in the world loves me.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Okay, Ryan's the temp. What does he do at night?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: I guess we just have to wait until night and see.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Oh, or maybe not. [turns out the lights]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Right. Do you see a clue or...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Yeah. Did you not see it? ["Eat at Hanks" is written in glow-in-the-dark letters above the door]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Well, we were just looking for Ryan, so he's not here.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Oh, yeah, we were. We were just looking to say hi. So hey.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: You wanted to have sex in my office.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: No. It's... it's cool. Just try to put everything back were you found it. Text me when you're finished. I'll be out here.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: That was so embarrassing. I'm gonna die.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Let me make something clear. Jim and I have never and will never have sex in the office.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: No, because the office isn't what I'd consider a romantic place.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Besides, we have something those other people don't have, which is a home and a bed.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No touching. Ah, I'm trying not to touch you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, no, so close. Oh. No, we can't do that. We can't do this. Ohh.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I don't know what your body feels like 'cause I can't touch it.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Okay, this is much worse than before.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Yeah, I agree. This is nasty.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I will grab you here anyway. [laughs]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: You have to cut it out.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I did say I would, but I was wrong. I can't stop. You don't what it is like to love a woman and have her love you back. It is a feeling that cannot and will not, and frankly, cannot be contained.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: No one is a bigger fan of sexual touching than me. But with you two, it's reaching the level of a complex. I can think of three explanations. One: You're taking MDMA. Street name, ecstasy. I've done it, and I know the feeling.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Number two: You're desperately trying to fit in a whole relationship before Toby comes back from jury duty and Holly has to go back to Nashua. Or three: You're at an age where your sexual climaxes aren't as powerful so you need to overcompensate with foreplay, taboo behavior.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yes, it was that. It's that one.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Give me all your money and take off your clothes.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Come one. Nobody's looking. What's wrong?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I haven't thought about you having to go back to Nashua.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Maybe we didn't want to think about it. We can make it work. We'll date long-distance.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That's what we said last time. Remember? We broke up on the drive. How's this gonna be any different?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: We weren't in love last time.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I was in love with you.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I'm not saying it won't be hard. But we can make it work. That's what she said.

quotes.speaker: Hank
quotes.line: Here's your bottle of sparkling cider.

quotes.speaker: Hank
quotes.line: I'm now supposed to tell you to enjoy a mind-hunt break and look for a heart or some [bleep] in the break room when you're through.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: [through the window at Michael] Hey, buck up, buddy!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Hey. Hey. Come on. You're hurting him.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: ...is ticking down. When it goes off, no more kissing. No more hugging.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [into recorder] Boner Bomb starring Jason Statham. Or we go against type with an Eisenberg or a Michael Cera.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No. [into recorder] Saving the world has never been this hard.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Okay. Shh. Have you talked to her about your feelings? Women really go for that crap.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, I can't talk to her. I can't even look at her without thinking about it ending.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Which one? I have a lot of stupid faces.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I love that. I love that face.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Good. He loves it. Good. Jump. Jump up and down.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Don't do the squirrel. Throw your poop.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Maybe it's just more like, "be mine."

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Oh, yes. There's a note. "A little cookie for you, my miss. But the real treasure is your Valentine's kiss."

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.line: Mm. Oh. We're suppose to...mmm [leans in to kiss Andy]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Hmm. [points to Gabe blowing a kiss to Erin]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Holly, I love you so, so, so much. And I think we need to break up.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: What? What are you talking about?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Actually, it's Valentine's Day. Shouldn't be doing this today. I'll talk to you tomorrow.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No, we're gonna talk now. You're not breaking up with me.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You're gonna go back to Nashua eventually, and I can't handle it. So let's just...let's...

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: What if I said it wasn't up to them?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: The company. Nobody knows our future, but it's not gonna be decided by the company. It's not gonna be decided by anybody but us. What we are is up to you and me.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ladies and gentlemen, I have an announcement to make. As of today, officially, Holly and I are moving into together. Yay! [claps] Thank you. Thank you. Oscar, this must be tough for you, watching this go down. You could not stand in the way of true love, my friend!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Are you kidding? I wasn't trying to break you guys up.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well, the point is, there will no longer be any need for PDA here at the office between us because, when we get home, we are going to make love to and with one another, and that, to me, is the best Valentine's Day present that a person could receive. So I bid you all adieu.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Go on. Kiss each other already. [they kiss]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Suck it, Oscar. This must kill you.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: I just told them to do it!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: My perfect Valentine's Day? I'm at home, three cell phones in front of me, fielding desperate calls from people who want to buy one of the 50 restaurant reservations I made over six months ago.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Anybody can be Prince Charming one day a year with the dinner and the flowers and all that. But you know what impresses me? When a guy can do that no days a year.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Flowers, diamonds, three-course meal, violinist comes to my table to serenade me...

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Pizza, soda, the moon, someone to share it with.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: What are our plans for tonight? Umm...
